```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(mmbtools)
library(datasets)

mmb_load_fonts()
```

```{r}
## BASIC LINE PLOT
diamonds %>%
    filter(cut=="Good") %>%
    filter(color == "D") %>%
    ggplot(aes(x=carat, y=price)) +
    geom_line() +
    labs(title = "Comparing Carat Size and Price"
         ,x="Carats",y="Price") +
    theme_mmb_basic(axis.text = element_text(size=12)
                    ,panel.grid.major.x = element_line())
```

```{r}
## BASIC LINE PLOT WITH MMB COLORS
diamonds %>%
    filter(cut=="Good") %>%
    filter(color == "D") %>%
    ggplot(aes(x=carat, y=price, color=clarity)) +
    geom_line(size=1) +
    #scale_color_mncol(palette = "main") +
    scale_color_manual("Legend", values = c("#003685","#78BE21","#008EAA",
                                            "#8D3F2B","#5D295F","#FFC845",
                                            "#97999B","#A6192E")) +
    labs(title = "Comparing Carat Size and Price by Clarity"
         ,x="Carats",y="Price") +
    theme_mmb_basic(legend.position = "bottom"
                    ,axis.text = element_text(size=12)
                    ,panel.grid.major.x = element_line())
```
